title: Herbaciarnia Herbata Tea Room
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Organic, Beer/Wine, Polish
description: Tea room next to the Bytomskim market. Serves snacks like Indian dumplings plus house-made recipe for hot chocolate, cocktails, sweets. Large selection of tea and infusions. Offers 3 different seating areas. Plays atmospheric music, has board games, access to Wi-Fi and terminal. Waterpipe smoking permitted.
